body.p:
Buffalo New York
November 16, 1865
Gov. Bramlett

I am an entire stranger to you, but I take the liberty of writing you requesting the appointment of myself to the Office of Commissioner of deeds for Ky in New-York to reside at Buffalo, A number of my clients have interests in your state and in transacting business I find it quite convenient to be authorized to take acknowledgnt &c. -- I am commissioner for nearly all the Northern & some of the Southern States and very frequently called
by persons desiring a commissioner for Ky --

I can refer your excellency to numerous persons in our state, such as Millard Fillmore Gov Fenton Ex Gov Seymour, Dean Richard and Hon. E. G. Spaulding. Judge Tilden & Fox & French Attys Cincinnati Ohio, -- I can give any reference which may be desired -- The late Gov Brough was an old friend of mine -- Let me here from you as soon as convenient

I am Truly Yours
Lyman P. Perkins

Comr of Deeds
New York
Lyman P. Perkins
Buffalo
comd
20th Nov/65
